summary: Petri Luukkainen conducts an experiment with his own life. He packs all his things and puts them in storage. At first naked in an empty apartment, he only allows himself to retrieve one item per day.
cast: Petri Luukkainen|Helena Saarinen|Juho Luukkainen|Eero Löyttyjärvi|Petri Purho|Marja-Riitta Männistö|Jesse Jokinen|Jesse Saarinen|Maija Lassila|Anne Tarvainen|Joona Tolvanen|Toni Mäkelä|Jakke Saarinen|Eija Saarinen|Riku Tähtinen|Kim Grandlund|Jukka Berghäll|Rauno Männistö
title: Tavarataivas
